# Canadian Dental Care Plan Request for Proposal

## Solicitation Information

*   Solicitation Number: WS4053399035
*   Solicitation Date: June 21, 2023
*   Closing Date and Time: July 20, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Time
*   Amendment Number: 3, Release Date: July 7, 2023

## Contract Information

*   Contract Title: Canadian Dental Care Plan
*   Contract Type: Medical Claims Review and Management, Dental Services
*   Contract Category: Service
*   Expected Contract Start Date: October 2, 2023
*   Expected Contract End Date: N/A

## Procurement Method

*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Traditional
*   Trade Agreements: None

## Selection Criteria

*   Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

## Contact Information

*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Contact Name: Holmes, Valerie (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Contact Email: valerie.holmes@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Request for Proposal Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) on behalf of Health Canada (HC) to acquire the services of a single contractor for the provision of dental care claims processing and adjudication services for the Canadian Dental Care Plan (CDCP). The services will be provided to the Department of Health (HC) under the direction of the Government of Canada. The contractor will be responsible for processing and adjudicating claims for dental services rendered under the Canadian Dental Care Plan. The prognosis for the contract is for an initial period of two (2) years, with renewal options for an additional two (2) years.

## Questions

Inquiries must be submitted electronically via email to valerie.holmes@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
